alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area; Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca; San Juan County; Western Skagit County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 7:35PM PST until January 18 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...San Juan County, including Stuart Island, Waldron Island, Orcas Island, San Juan Island, Lopez Island, Blakely Island, and Decatur Island, Lowlands of western Skagit County, including Cypress Island, Guemes Island, Anacortes, Mount Vernon, and La Conner, Admiralty Inlet Area, including Port Townsend, Whidbey Island, and Camano Island and Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca lowlands, including Port Angeles, Sequim, and Blyn. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility in heavier snow showers. Light ice accumulation is possible in areas of freezing rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Inlet Area; Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca; San Juan County; Western Skagit County
